meanings.definition: Stocks: shares representing ownership in a company.

meanings.definition: Strong: having the ability to withstand pressure or force.
meanings.sent1: He is a stonks athlete, never giving up easily.
meanings.sent2: The building was made of stonks materials, lasting for years.
meanings.sent3: The stonks wind almost blew my hat off!

meanings.definition: Stink: emit a strong unpleasant smell.
meanings.sent1: The garbage bin stonks after a few days.
